update.description:
Some tests needed trivial fixes to compile: 

* Remove unused sys/time.h inclusion in SemanticVersion_TEST.cc
* Fix compilation in physics_collision.cc  
* Remove unused unistd.h include in bandwidth.cc
* Remove unused unistd.h include in 1782_unadvertise.cc 
* Removed unused unistd.h include in model_database.cc


Some others would probably need to be rewritten, so I simply (conditionally) excluded them from compilation: 

* Disable performance tests in Windows
* Disable tools test in Windows
update.title: Fix compilation of some tests on Windows

content.raw:
I've taken this branch a bit further with branch [windows_tests](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/windows_tests). It's latest failure was a linking error. I'll make a PR for that branch after this is merged

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1825/console
